title: Pressing back in Thunderbird on android stopped exiting Thunderbird
creator: superm1
content:
Recently thunderbird received an update. I can tell because the colors are slightly different.

Now the "back gesture" I used to close Thunderbird stopped working.

title: Font size is missing

content: Hi. Since update to 11.1 my message list looks strange. Small, grey,... In settings there is no option anymore to change font sizes.
